name: Sonai Barua

services.title: Software Development
services.description: We specialize in crafting and developing innovative software solutions, focusing on enhancing the user experience and optimizing performance. Our expertise spans across various domains, including online advertising, with a keen emphasis on visual appeal and effectiveness.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Our web development services encompass the design and creation of essential brand elements, such as logos, color schemes, typography, and other components. We strive to differentiate your brand from competitors by creating captivating and memorable digital experiences that resonate with your audience.

services.title: React Js Development
services.description: Leveraging the power of React JS, we build and optimize your online presence to serve as the digital gateway to your business. From crafting responsive interfaces to enhancing website performance, we ensure that your digital platform serves as a robust revenue channel and effectively engages your target audience.

services.title: MERN Stack Development
services.description: With expertise in the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack, we integrate creative design and technical proficiency to develop immersive and dynamic web applications. Our solutions include captivating 3D visualizations that breathe life into your projects, delivering unparalleled user experiences.

aboutpara: Hi, I'm Sonai Barua, a dedicated ReactJS Developer at Claymind Solutions Pvt Ltd. Passionate about crafting exceptional digital experiences, I lead teams to deliver projects ahead of schedule, making a significant impact on business objectives. My expertise includes developing EduTech solutions with React.js, Redux Toolkit, and architecting e-commerce experiences with React, Redux, and Express.js. Armed with a Masterâ€™s in Computer Applications, I've honed skills in JavaScript, Java, ReactJS, Redux, and ExpressJs. Achievements include a global rank in TCS CodeVita Season 10 and recognition as the College Topper in 2023 by Dayananda Sagar University, Bangalore.
